title: Person Of Interest: Every Time A Main Character Gets Shot (UPDATED)
author: FringeMusic107
comment: It's amazing how many bullets that Reese has taken in the course of his job with Finch (which is why he wears a vest). This doesn't count the times that he deliberately stepped into the path of bullets for Finch.
hey, nice vid. you did a grea job. I'm wondering if you could list me the episode in which reese gets shot everytime? that would be great. thanks.
Has anyone notice, in every season in the 10 episode something happens to Reese. Something bad. Just saying.         Chirp
Paint him yellow and he becomes spongebob
